column2: "Na muhun ɔbɔfo bi dɛ ofi sor risian a okitsa bun no ne saafee na nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn kɛse wɔ ne nsamu."

column3: ɔwɔ dadaw no a ɔno nye Abɔnsam nye Satan no

column2: "na ɔtoow no kyeen bun no mu
column4: na ɔsɔɔw ano wɔ no do
column6: gyedɛ mfe apem no aso ana: na ɔno ekyir otwar dɛ wɔsan no mber kakra."

column4: na wɔdze atsɛmbu maa hɔn: na muhun hɔn a Jesus dasedzi
column5: nye Nyankopɔn asɛm ntsi wotwitwaa hɔn etsir no hɔn akra
column6: nye hɔn a wɔannkotow abowa no
column8: na wɔanngye nsewhyɛ no wɔ hɔn momapɔw nye hɔn nsa do no; na wɔtsenaa ase nye Kraest dzii hen mfe apem."

column3: woennya nkwa bio dze kodur dɛ mfe apem no bowie du. Iyi nye owusoɛr a odzi kan no."

column2: "Nhyira nye krɔnkrɔn nye onyia no a onya kyɛfa wɔ owusoɛr a odzi kan no mu no: iyinom na owu mprɛnu no nnyi hɔn do tum; na wɔbɛyɛ Nyankopɔn nye Kraest asɔfo
column3: na wɔnye no edzi hen mfe apem."

column2: "Na sɛ mfe apem no wie du a
column5: "na obopue akɛdaadaa amanaman a wɔwɔ asaase mfɛndzanan no
column7: akɔboaboa hɔn ano akɔ sa: hɔn na hɔn dodow tse dɛ mpoano anhwea."

column3: na wokotwaa ahotseweefo nseraban nye kurow a wɔdɔ no no ho hyiae: na ogya fi sor wɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn bɛhyeew hɔn."
wɔtoow no kyeen gya nye sɔɔfee nsutaae no mu
column4: hɔ na abowa no nye nkɔnhyɛnyi torfo no so wɔ; na wɔbɛyɛ hɔn ayaayaadze adzekyee nye adzesaa mbersantsen mfesantsen."

column3: nye nyia ɔtse do no a asaase nye ɔsor fii n’enyim guanee; na woennya beebi amma hɔn no."

column4: dɛ wogyinagyina ahengua no enyim; na woebuebue nwoma mu: na woebue nwoma bi so a ɔyɛ nkwa nwoma no mu: na wɔnam dza wɔakyerɛw wɔ nwoma no mu no do buu ewufo no atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse."

column2: "Na po yii ewufo a wɔwɔ no mu mae; na owu nye samanadze yii ewufo a wɔwɔ hɔn mu mae
column3: na wobuu hɔn mu biara atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ndwuma tse."

column2: "Na wɔtoow owu nye samanadze guu ogya nsutaae no mu. Iyi nye owu mprɛnu no."
"Na obiara a woennhu dɛ wɔakyerɛw ne dzin wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu no
column3: wɔtoow no kyeen ogya nsutaae no mu."
